title: Living tomorrow. No. 117
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Farnsborough Airfield; moon landing and relationship to earth and vegetation; new atlas of the world including genetics, fossils and wild peas (“discovery of”) growing from tendrils no leaves; water usage and control for consumption, leisure and industry.
